title: Hair we go - Wright opens new home-based darts event with NHS tribute
description: A look at the first night of the 'home tour' as darts players compete from their own houses.
content:
World champion Peter 'Snakebite' Wright was in action on the opening night of the PDC Home Tour
'Snakebite' boasts a multi-coloured mohican with an NHS logo on his head, the 'Iceman' competes from his kitchen and two top performers are ruled out because of p… [+3874 chars]
